short_summary: Open Source Software Technical Support for Enterprise Monitoring Platform (EMP)
description: Open source software technical support forlientd and Prometheus, key components of the Enterprise Monitoring Platform (EMP).
full_summary:
=====================================================

### Enterprise Monitoring Platform (EMP) Technical Support

The Government of Canada is seeking to establish a contract for the provision of technical support services for the Enterprise Monitoring Platform (EMP), specifically for the open-source software components of Fluentd and Prometheus.

#### Tender Information

| **Parameter** | **Value** |
| --- | --- |
| Reference Number | cb-5101-5927084 |
| Amendment Number | 4 |
| Solicitation Number | CIC-155488 |
| Publication Date | 2023-05-01 |
| Tender Closing Date (UTC) | 2023-06-07T14:00:00 |
| Expected Contract Start Date | 2023-07-04 |
| Expected Contract End Date | 2026-06-30 |

#### Notice Type and Procurement Method

The tender is a request for proposal, conducted under a competitive open-bidding process.

#### Trade Agreements

This tender opportunity is open to all eligible suppliers, and any contract awarded will be subject to the terms and conditions of the applicable trade agreements, including the Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA).

#### Technical Specifications

The successful supplier will be required to provide technical support services for the open-source software components of Fluentd and Prometheus, as specified in Appendix D, Statement of Work.

#### Tender Documents

The tender documents, including the solicitation and appendices, are available for download from the Government of Canada’s procurement platform:

*   [Request for Proposal (RFP) Document](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/5101/ircc-155488---request-for-proposal---amd-002.pdf)
*   [Appendix I: Application for Registration][appendix-i] (<https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/5101/appendix-i---application-for-registration-%28afr-for-canadian-legal-entities.pdf>)
*   [Contract Evaluation Criteria][contract-evaluation](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/5101/ircc-155488---request-for-proposal---amd-001.pdf)

Note: To ensure timely delivery and proper consideration of proposals, all questions and answers must be submitted and answered in the format outlined in the [Request for Proposal (RFP) Document][rfp-document].

**Authors Retain Ownership**
